Pratik Patel is is a software and hardware nerd that loves to build things. He has spoken at various conferences and participates in several local tech groups and startup groups and never met a programming platform he didn't like, except for Perl. He currently works at IBM, mostly because of the free cloud credits to mine Bitcoin.
